subject: Investing
title: Fear and Greed: The Emotional Seesaw
description: A 60-second lesson on Fear and Greed: The Emotional Seesaw.

hook.text: Warren Buffett said, 'Be fearful when others are greedy, and greedy when others are fearful.'

buildup.text: Fear makes you sell at the bottom. Greed makes you buy at the top. Both destroy returns.

discovery.text: The CNN Fear & Greed Index tracks seven market indicators to gauge current investor emotion.

twist.text: Extreme fear often marks the best buying opportunities. Extreme greed often marks the worst.

climax.text: Automating your investments removes emotion from the equation entirely.

punchline.text: Emotions are useful for life, terrible for portfolios.

quiz.question: According to Buffett, when should you be greedy?
options: When markets are at all-time highs
